statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer'
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT equipment_type, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%Printer%'
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type='Computer' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%Weekly%' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type='Printer' OR equipment_type='Scanner' ORDER BY maintenance_schedule DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-01-01' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, equipment_name FROM equipment_inventory JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_quantity FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_quantity DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_day FROM FitnessClasses WHERE class_instructor='John Doe';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date != '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_quantity > 10;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_day, class_time FROM FitnessClasses WHERE class_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT e.equipment_id, e.equipment_name, e.equipment_quantity, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_description FROM Equipment e INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_day FROM FitnessClasses WHERE class_day = 'Monday' ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'Good';
SELECT class_type, instructor FROM fitness_classes WHERE max_capacity > 20;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT class_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT es.name, ms.start_date, ms.end_date FROM maintenance_schedule ms JOIN equipment es ON ms.equipment_id = es.id WHERE ms.technician_id = 123;

SELECT fc.class_type, fc.instructor, cs.day_of_week, cs.start_time, cs.end_time FROM fitness_classes fc JOIN class_schedule cs ON fc.id = cs.class_id WHERE fc.max_capacity > 20 ORDER BY cs.start_time ASC;
SELECT es.name AS equipment_name, fc.class_type, fc.instructor, cs.day_of_week FROM equipment es, fitness_classes fc, class_schedule cs WHERE es.id = fc.id AND fc.id = cs.class_id;
SELECT es.name, es.condition, ms.start_date, ms.end_date, ms.technician_id FROM equipment es LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON es.id = ms.equipment_id AND ms.start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM classes WHERE instructor_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT member_name, member_email, member_phone FROM members WHERE member_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT schedule_id, class_id, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM classes WHERE instructor_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM members WHERE member_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM classes JOIN class_schedule ON classes.class_id = class_schedule.class_id;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM last_maintenance_date) = 2022;
